Description: A small piece of red pigment.
Curator's comments: On the use of red ochre for painting, see L. Lee and S. Quirke, 'Painting Materials' in P.T. Nicholson and I. Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), 113-14. For analysis of red pigments in an 18th dynasty tomb at Thebes, see B. McCarthy, 'Technical analysis of reds and yellows in the Tomb of Suemniwet, Theban Tomb 92', in W.V. Davies (ed), Colour and Painting in Ancient Egypt (London, 2001), 17-21
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
